title: Wrangler Mens Relaxed Bootcut Jean
description: RELAXED FIT. This jean sits at the natural waistline and features a relaxed seat and thigh for the perfect amount of space. The bootcut legs will easily fit your favorite pair of boots in proper Western style.
ELEVATED STYLE. The perfect combination of comfort and durability, these jeans always have your back. Wear them with your favorite t-shirt, button-down or hoodie to complete the look.
STRETCH DENIM. These bootcut jeans are crafted from a comfortable cotton blend with just a hint of stretch to keep you comfortable no matter what's on the agenda.
FIVE POCKET STYLING. This jean is constructed with our iconic 5 pocket styling: (1) watch pocket, (2) front scoop pockets, (2) back spade pockets.
SIGNATURE DETAILS. Equipped with Wrangler hardware and the easily recognizable 'W' pocket embroideries, this is a style that will never go away.
